Item ID4155

The enchanted gem is an item used in the Slayer skill. They are sold by all Slayer Masters for one coin. These allow a player to contact the Slayer Master that has assigned them their current Slayer task, where they can ask for tips, ask who the master is and where they are located, and check how many monsters they still have left to kill for their task. However, it will not allow players to ask Slayer masters for new Slayer tasks.

Players who have unlocked the "Ring bling" ability for 300 Slayer reward points can craft these gems into slayer rings at 75 Crafting. Players who have unlocked the "Malevolent masquerade" ability for 400 Slayer reward points can craft this gem along with other components into a Slayer helmet at 55 Crafting.

The enchanted gem also has a right-click option to bring up a log recording every Slayer monster the player has killed. Once a player reaches 65,535 kills for a particular monster, the log will say "Lots!" for that monster's entry.

The Slayer Kill Log.

  • 1 Quests

Quests[edit | edit source]

The enchanted gem is a component of the commorb obtained from Sir Tiffy Cashien during the Wanted! quest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 January 2022
(update)

The Slayer Gem and related items can now tell you your current task streak even when you don't have a task.

7 April 2021
(update)

Boss and Slayer kill logs no longer output code debugging messages when opened.

7 May 2015
(update)

The "Partner" option was added.

12 December 2013
(update | poll)

The Slayer gem now keeps a log of every Slayer monster the player has killed (since this update), accessed via a right-click option on the gem.

9 May 2013
(update | poll)

The Slayer gem now has a right-click option for checking your progress.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.
